alston.minecraft

Class CraftingTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • alston.minecraft.Block
      • alston.minecraft.CraftingTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, Showable, java.io.Serializable

    public class CraftingTable
extends Block
implements Clickable, Showable, java.io.Serializable
    A Clickable Block that can show a Window (Showable) to craft Items. It handles all interactions with the majority of the GUI components of the Block, while the Block class handles the majority of the 3D components.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
